message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. After careful consideration, I have decided to offer this product to you at a special price of $20000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant personal importance, but I believe its potential value to you could be even greater. I am confident that it will serve you well and bring you joy or benefit. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.
